title: my built-in-system phone app on android crashes every time.
content:
Started about three weeks ago (assuming with a software update) 
Pixel XL
Google Fi Plan

The built-in-system "phone" app crashes every time I try to access it.  I can't go in and make calls, see recent calls, access voice mail, or use the dial out pad.  I can, however, receive calls and make calls from text message app or contacts list.  

For the first week or so, I could resolve it by "Force Stop", or "Clear Cache" or "Clear Storage" .. for the past two weeks, I can't resolve it even with the 'recommended' solutions on Google Fi Support. 

I cannot uninstall the app because it's a system app.

HELP Please.
